attributes.review: so FIRST, the app took 27.4 hours and 37 seconds to download. ummm what???? i dont want to wait that long! i want to be able to support my wonderf president and leader of the united states who i ever so dearly love! i am ashamed it would take so long. by the time it FINALLY downloaded, i clicked on the app. when i got into it, i was immediately taken to a screen saying that i should vote for trump in the upcoming 2020 elections. this is not bad. trump is a GREAT fat cheeto who loves ALL his children in â€˜merica. so of course, being the smart conservative that i am, i clicked the â€œyes, of course!!â€ button right under the headline. everything ran smoothly for ten minutes. the app was perfect but slowly i started getting weird pop up ads saying to give them my facebook password. so being the smart, intelligent woman that i am, gave it to them. but instead it took me to a weird website with a picture of the beautiful cheeto mansâ€™ head on a cow??? with ants sucking the milk biddies??? no thanks ğŸ˜¾ i did not give them permission for them to take me to such a horrific and disturbing image. i closed my firefox app (the one the website was on) and went back to the app to see what else was there. but when i tried to get in, i was met with a black screen and a weird robotic sound coming from my phone saying that they have gotten my location, social security number, and then it started blasting the song baby shark! i did not want to hear that disgusting sound. i exited the app and tried to delete it. but it said error and that the missile strike had been activaded and the bombs were on their way to my houseâ‰ï¸â‰ï¸â‰ï¸ DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!! THE MUSIC WILL NOT STOP, I HAVE BOMBS HEADING MY WAY, AND I STILL HAVE THE APP!!!!! WORST EXPERIENCE OF MY LIFE!!
